div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. I. Owned by Dr. H. R. Kranow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Illinois ATTENTION OF RUSSIANS OF CHICAGO

body.p: Sunday, April 20th, at Odd Fellows Hall, 2517-19 Fullerton Avenue, near Campbell Avenue, a lecture is arranged by the City Committee of the Russian Socialist Party on the subject: "Events of 1871 and 1917."
The lecturer is Comrade C. Kopnagel. Beginning at 2 P. M. Admission is 10 cents.
